price: Katakanlah, "Tiap-tiap orang berbuat menurut keadaannya 867 masing-masing".  Maka Tuhan-mu lebih mengetahui siapa yang lebih benar jalannya.
arabic: قُلۡ كُلّٞ يَعۡمَلُ عَلَىٰ شَاكِلَتِهِۦ فَرَبُّكُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنۡ هُوَ أَهۡدَىٰ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: 867.  Termasuk dalam pengertian "keadaan" di sini ialah tabiat dan pengaruh alam sekitarnya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul kullun yaʿmalu ʿalā shākilatihi farabbukum aʿlamu biman huwa ahdā sabīlan
